body_html:
if you have a Titan-X Pascal, the minimum CUDA version required is CUDA 8.0.
This is not a PyTorch requirement but NVIDIA's itself.

CUDA 7.5 does not recognize CUDA Compute Architecture 6.0/6.1

I suggest that you upgrade to CUDA 8.0

I suggest that you upgrade to CUDA 8.0
body:
if you have a Titan-X Pascal, the minimum CUDA version required is CUDA 8.0.
This is not a PyTorch requirement but NVIDIA's itself.

CUDA 7.5 does not recognize CUDA Compute Architecture 6.0/6.1

I suggest that you upgrade to CUDA 8.0
